winapps-org/winapps

Runs Windows apps as Linux desktop programs with system integration

Related repos

  • Taskbar launcher for Windows applications on Linux
  • Runs Windows apps on Linux via containerized virtual machines
  • Run Windows applications on Linux as if they were native
  • Run Windows apps on Linux and macOS via Docker
  • ReactOS is an open source operating system aiming for compatibility with Windows applications and drivers
  • Run Linux command-line tools and apps inside Windows
  • Runs Windows applications in a browser via WebAssembly
  • Repackages Windows app for Linux
  • Windows ARM in Docker containers for devices like Raspberry Pi
